dataset_id: CLASIC07 Vegetation Water Content Map V001
organizations: National Snow and Ice Data Center
title: CLASIC07 Vegetation Water Content Map V001
summary: The Vegetation Water Content (VWC) map for the Cloud and Land Surface Interaction Campaign 2007 (CLASIC07) was derived by calculating Normalized Difference Water Index (NDWI) from ResourceSat-1 satellite imagery.
